About

Siddharth Bulia here, a fourth year CS undergraduate at IITB.

My interest mainly lies in Computer Graphics, Computer Vision and Security.

I read a lot. Apart from reading books, quora, reddit, hackernews and medium are among my favourite online sources of reading.
